description: iQOO Neo 10 series and iQOO 13 were launched in the fourth quarter of last year. iQOO is now believed to be working on iQOO 15 series and iQOO Neo 11 series. While the Vivo sub-brand is yet to confirm the handsets, the display and battery details of the handsets have been tipped. They are expected to bring significant upgrades over their predecessors. The iQOO 15 series and iQOO Neo 11 series could feature 2K resolution displays.
title: iQOO 15 Series, iQOO Neo 11 Series Tipped to Feature 2K Display and 7,000mAh Battery

description: Motorola Edge 60 model may be introduced soon. The purported handset will likely be accompanied by Pro and Fusion variants. The likely prices, colourways and RAM, storage configurations of the rumoured smartphones have been leaked. Details about the Moto G56 and Moto G86 have surfaced online as well.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Series, Moto G56 and Moto G86 Price, Colours, Storage Options Leaked

description: NASA and the Italian Space Agency made history by successfully tracking GNSS signals on the Moon through the LuGRE experiment. The technology could revolutionise lunar navigation, aiding missions like Artemis. LuGRE had earlier set records for GNSS signal acquisition in deep space, reaching lunar orbit before its final touchdown. The data collected could help future spacecraft navigate autonomously, reducing dependence on Earth-based tracking. This achievement highlights the growing role of GNSS in space exploration, with potential applications extending to Mars missions.
title: NASA Tracks GNSS Signals on Moon, Advancing Lunar Navigation Technology

description: Federal Communication Commission (FCC) filings have revealed the Nintendo Switch 2 will support Near Field Communication (NFC) and Wi-Fi 6. The filings also confirm the Switch 2 will be chargeable via the new second USB Type-C port present on the top of the device.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Will Support NFC and Wi-Fi 6, FCC Filings Reveal

description: OnePlus is planning to replace the iconic Alert Slider with a new customisable smart button, the company revealed on Monday. The Alert Slider, which has been a mainstay on all OnePlus flagship smartphones till date, is a physical switch that allows users to quickly change the sound profile of the device without waking it up.
title: OnePlus Reveals Plans to Replace Alert Slider With a Customisable Smart Button

description: A potential supermassive black hole may exist in the Large Magellanic Cloud, as per recent scientific findings. Researchers analysed hypervelocity stars moving at extreme speeds and found many could have been ejected from this neighbouring galaxy. The black hole is estimated to be around 600,000 times the mass of the Sun. If confirmed, this discovery would add to the understanding of how galaxies interact with black holes. The study has been accepted for publication in The Astrophysical Journal.
title: Supermassive Black Hole May Be Hiding in Large Magellanic Cloud, Scientists Suggest

description: At the White House Crypto Summit, President Trump asked SEC’s Crypto Task Force to put US’ crypto and stablecoins regulations “on his desk” by the end of August this year. This gives the task force approximately five months to complete the research and proposal work.
title: US President Trump Directs SEC Task Force to Outline Crypto Rules by August

description: Apple recently launched a handful of new devices including the iPhone 16e, MacBook Air with M4, iPad Air and more. After the launch of new products, the Cupertino-based tech giant seems to have shifted its focus to pushing the boundaries of audio technology. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple is exploring ways to include tiny cameras in its future AirPods. The brand is likely to debut this technology on the AirPods Pro 4.
title: Apple AirPods With Inbuilt Cameras in Development: Mark Gurman

description: Asus has launched the Asus Zenbook A14 and Vivobook 16 in India with new Snapdragon X series processors. The Asus Zenbook A14 comes in two processor variants — Snapdragon X Elite and Snapdragon X. The Asus Vivobook 16, on the other hand, runs on the Snapdragon X X1-26-100 chipset. The Copilot+ PCs feature the Qualcomm Hexagon NPU, delivering up to 45 TOPS (trillion operations per second) for supporting multiple AI-focused tools.
title: Asus Zenbook A14, Vivobook 16 With Snapdragon X Series CPUs Debut in India

description: Binance is set to deploy a co-governance mechanism involving community members to decide on the listing and delisting of tokens. The exchange said community input has repeatedly come-in handy around token evaluations which prompted it to increase the involvement of its community members into the token listing process.
title: Binance to List, Delist Tokens Based on Community Votes: Here’s How It Will Work

description: ChatGPT for macOS is getting a new feature that will make it easier for software developers to get coding assistance. Announced last week, the new artificial intelligence (AI) feature allows the OpenAI chatbot to work with integrated development environments (IDEs) and edit code in the user’s preferred coding tool. This will enable them to not spend time manually transferring code and make the process more seamless.
title: ChatGPT for macOS Gets Upgraded With Code Editing Capability Directly in IDEs

description: DuckDuckGo, the privacy-focused web browser, announced the rollout of AI-assisted answers on its search engine last week. The feature was so far available in beta, but now the company is releasing it to all users. With this, users will be able to see an artificial intelligence (AI) generated summary of their searched query, similar to Google’s AI Overviews feature.
title: DuckDuckGo Introduces AI-Assisted Answers On Its Search Engine, Upgrades Duck.ai Chatbot

description: Scientists have developed Aurora, the first modular quantum computer that operates at room temperature. Unlike traditional quantum systems requiring near absolute zero temperatures, Aurora uses photonic qubits interconnected via fiber optics. This innovation by Xanadu enhances fault tolerance and scalability, paving the way for future quantum data centers. Researchers believe it could transform drug discovery and secure communication. The team is now working on minimizing optical signal loss to improve performance further.
title: First Modular Quantum Computer Works at Room Temperature Without Cooling

description: iQOO Z10 series is expected to launch in China soon. The lineup is expected to include a base, a Turbo, a Turbo Pro and a Z10x variant. A recent leak has hinted at the key expected features of the purported handsets as well as the probable launch timeline of the phones. The standard and Turbo variants could launch in April.
title: iQOO Z10 Series May Launch in April; Key Features Surface Online

description: A large network of ancient irrigation canals has been discovered in Iraq’s Eridu region, dating back over 3,000 years. The system, with over 200 major canals and 4,000 smaller ones, was used to divert Euphrates River water to farms. Researchers traced the canals using satellite imagery and geological mapping. The findings suggest the canals were built in different periods and were not all operational at the same time. The region was eventually abandoned after the river shifted course, leaving behind a well-preserved archaeological landscape.
title: 3,000-Year-Old Mesopotamian Canal System Found in Iraq, Unveiling Ancient Irrigation Methods

description: March releases include Assassin's Creed Shadows, Two Point Museum, WWE 2K25, Atomfall, Rise of the Ronin and more. Rise of the Ronin was released on PS5 last year and finally arrives on PC this month.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows, WWE 2K25, Two Point Museum and More: The Biggest Games of March

description: Foxconn has launched its first large language model called FoxBrain. Foxconn said that though there was a slight performance gap compared with China's DeepSeek's distillation model, its overall performance is very close to world-class standards.
title: Foxconn Unveils First Large Language Model Dubbed 'FoxBrain'

description: Google is making a couple of changes to Gemini. Announced on Friday, one of the changes is focused on the lexicon of Gemini tools, while the other improves the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot’s capability of connecting with different apps. The company is currently rolling out this update to all Google Workspace accounts, although the renaming effort applies to all users.
title: Google Renaming Gemini Extensions to ‘Apps’, Powers It With Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking

description: Poco F7 Pro is expected to launch in select global markets soon. Some key features of the handset have recently been spotted on an Android monitoring database. Previous reports claim that the purported smartphone could have similar features as the Redmi K80 handset, which was unveiled in China in November 2024 alongside a Redmi K80 Pro variant.
title: Poco F7 Pro Key Features Surface Online; May Get a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC

description: Kollywood’s blockbuster Return of the Dragon, starring Pradeep Ranganathan, Anupama Parameswaran, and Kayadu Lohar, is set for its OTT release. The film, which has grossed over Rs 120 crore, will stream on Netflix from March 28. Directed by Ashwath Marimuthu and produced under AGS Entertainment, the movie blends action, comedy, and drama. With strong performances and an engaging plot, the digital release is highly anticipated. Here’s everything about its OTT premiere, cast, and reception.
title: Return of the Dragon OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Rewind, a Telugu-language sci-fi thriller, is now available on Lionsgate Play. Starring Sai Ronak and Amrutha Chowdary, the film explores time travel with gripping twists. Directed by Kalyan Chakravarthy, it received a strong IMDb rating of 9.4/10. Watch now in Hindi & Telugu.
title: Rewind Telugu Sci-Fi Thriller Now on Lionsgate Play: Everything You Need to Know

description: Researchers at Tohoku University have developed a new method for synthesising porous organic polymers (POPs) with high purity. By using iodine as an oxidant and removing residual impurities through ethanol washing, the polymers achieve superior porosity and CO2 adsorption efficiency. The study highlights their potential for gas separation, energy storage, and fuel cell applications. These findings could pave the way for innovative solutions in reducing greenhouse gas emissions and improving clean energy technologies.
title: Scientists Create Cleaner Polymers To Absorb CO2 and Improve Energy Tech

description: A deeply moving short film, Zara Si Dhoop tells the story of Neelima, a paraplegic mother, and her ambitious daughter, Piyali. As Neelima’s playful mischief clashes with Piyali’s career-driven mindset, an unintended consequence forces them to confront their emotions. With stellar performances by Sheeba Chaddha and Plabita Borthakur, this Women’s Day release explores themes of love, misunderstandings, and forgiveness. Directed by Prakhar Tripathi and produced by Aayushi Agarwal, Zara Si Dhoop is now streaming on The Short Cuts YouTube channel.
title: Zara Si Dhoop Now Streaming YouTube: A Moving Women’s Day Short Film on Love and Forgiveness

description: Bharti Airtel has introduced a new recharge plan for its prepaid mobile users with data rollover benefits, according to a report. Dubbed as the Weekend Rollover Data Pack, it is said to carry over the unused mobile data saved from the weekdays and add it to the existing allowance for the weekend. It is currently reported to be available to Airtel users located in the telecom provider’s Haryana and the North-East circles.
title: Airtel's New Rs. 59 Prepaid Recharge Pack Reportedly Gets Weekend Data Rollover Facility

description: Kojima Productions has confirmed the release date of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach with new trailer detailing more gameplay, a new character and more. The action-adventure title will launch June 16, 2025, exclusively on PS5.
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Release Date Confirmed, New Trailer Shows Gameplay

description: Laila, featuring Vishwak Sen in the lead, was released in cinemas on February 14, 2025, but failed to perform at the box office, leading to its withdrawal within three days. Directed by Ram Narayan, the film follows a salon owner who disguises himself as a woman to escape from goons. Despite its comedic premise, Laila struggled to impress audiences and currently holds a 2.7/10 rating on IMDb. The movie is now available for streaming on Prime Video, giving viewers another chance to watch it.
title: Laila OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Motel Malati, directed by Mike Wiluan and Billy Christian, is an Indonesian horror film centred on a mysterious inn where guests are trapped by a supernatural curse. Featuring Alexandra Gottardo, Adinda Breton, and Kiki Narendra, the film unravels dark secrets involving occult practices and inhumane experiments. Originally released in theatres on 16 March 2023, the movie is now available for streaming on Lionsgate Play. With an IMDb rating of 5.1/10, it has received mixed reactions from audiences.
title: Motel Malati Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: Everything You Need to Know

description: Apple has been rumoured to be developing a smart home hub for quite some time now. It was expected to be launched some time in March as the latest addition to the company’s portfolio of smart home products but now faces a postponement, according to a seasoned journalist. This is attributed to the struggles faced by the Cupertino-based technology giant in developing a more advanced version of Siri, whose capabilities the purported smart home devices may largely depend upon.
title: Apple’s Smart Home Hub Launch Reportedly Postponed Due to Siri Delays

description: Realme P3 5G and the P3 Ultra 5G handsets will launch in India next week, the company has confirmed. Several key features of the upcoming smartphones, including the chipset, display, battery, charging specifications and their availability details, have also been revealed. Alongside the new smartphones, Realme will also unveil a pair of TWS earphones.
title: Realme P3 5G, P3 Ultra 5G India Launch Date Set for March 19; Key Features, Availability Details Confirmed

description: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro is said to be in the works. The Chinese smartphone brand is yet to confirm its existence, but ahead of it, a new leak has revealed details about the upcoming Civi series smartphone. The Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro is said to come with a 6,000mAh battery and 50-megapixel telephoto sensor. It could be the first to run on the forthcoming Snapdragon 8s Elite chipset. The handset will debut as a successor of the Xiaomi Civi 4 Pro. It was announced in March last year in China with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC.
title: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro Tipped to Feature 6,000mAh Battery, Telephoto Camera, More

description: iOS 19 is the purported next iteration of Apple’s operating system (OS) for iPhone that is expected to be showcased at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025 this summer. A major part of the update is likely to be Apple Intelligence — the company’s artificial intelligence (AI) suite — which was unveiled at WWDC 2024 before being rolled out to iPhone models in September with iOS 18. However, a report claims that iOS 19 may not bring any new Apple Intelligence capabilities, but simply expand it to cover more apps.
title: Apple’s iOS 19 Will Reportedly Expand Apple Intelligence Capabilities to More Apps

description: Manus AI, an artificial intelligence (AI) agent developed by the AI firm Monica, was introduced last week. China based 'The Butterfly Effect' is Monica's parent company, and called Manus a general AI agent that can handle a wide range of tasks of high complexity. After a video showcasing the capabilities of the AI agent was shared on social media platforms, Manus was given the accolade of “China's second DeepSeek moment.”
title: Chinese Firm Introduces Manus AI, a General Purpose AI Agent Said to Outperform OpenAI’s DeepResearch

description: The crypto market cap witnessed a notable dip of 4.35 percent in the last 24 hours. Both Bitcoin and Ether registered losses on the price charts alongside majority altcoins on Monday, March 10. Solana, Dogecoin, Cardano joined Bitcoin and Ether in clocking pride dips. Whereas, Iota and Status emerged among underdog cryptocurrencies that reflected minor gains on the price charts.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin, Ether Continue to Trade in Losses, Majority Altcoins Fail to See Gains

description: HMD Barbie Flip Phone will be available in India soon, according to teasers from the company. The phone was initially launched in certain regions in August 2024. The flip feature phone flaunts Barbie aesthetics in a pink colourway. The accompanying accessories, like back covers, the charger, and the battery, come in varying shades of pink. The phone also has a Barbie-themed user interface.
title: HMD Barbie Flip Phone Confirmed to Launch in India Soon

description: Flipkart Big Saving Days sale is live in India with an array of discounts on the latest iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 models. The discount sale, which started on March 7 in the country, is scheduled to conclude on March 13. Flipkart has partnered with HDFC to offer an instant discount of up to Rs. 4,000 on purchases made using their cards. Buyers can also avail of additional exchange offers, additional bonuses, no-cost EMI options and coupon discounts.
title: iPhone 16, iPhone 15 Series Get Discounts on Flipkart Big Saving Days Sale

description: Oppo F29 Pro 5G could launch in India soon alongside the Oppo F29 Pro+ 5G. Ahead of any official confirmation, a tipster has suggested several key features of the purported smartphones. The tipster has also leaked the alleged price ranges of the handsets. Both phones are expected to be mid-range offerings.
title: Oppo F29 Pro 5G, Oppo F29 Pro+ 5G Price in India, Key Features Leaked; Said to Launch Soon

description: Reliance Jio has introduced a new Rs. 100 recharge plan for prepaid users in India which offers the most affordable way to stream content from its new OTT platform, JioHotstar. By availing of this plan, Reliance Jio users can watch ad-supported content for free without having to subscribe to the streaming service’s monthly or yearly plan.
title: Reliance Jio's New Rs. 100 Prepaid Plan Bundles Complimentary JioHotstar Subscription

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 series was launched in January and it arrived with One UI 7 based on Android 15 out-of-the-box. While the OS’ rollout for other phones in the company’s portfolio is yet to reach completion, Samsung seems to have already begun testing its next OS dubbed One UI 8 which is likely to be based on Android 16. As per a tipster, the internal test build of One UI 8 has surfaced on the company’s server.
title: Samsung Said to Be Testing Android 16-Based One UI 8 on Flagship Galaxy S25 Series

description: The US DoJ dropped a proposal to force Alphabet's Google to sell its investments in AI firms. Google holds a minority stake worth billions of dollars in Anthropic. Losing the investment would hand a competitive advantage to OpenAI and its partner Microsoft, Anthropic wrote to the court in February.
title: US Drops Bid to Make Google Sell Anthropic Investments in Antitrust Case

description: US officials are reportedly worried about DeepSeek's handling of user data, which the company says it stores in servers located in China. A total of 21 state attorneys general have urged the US Congress to bar DeepSeek installation on government devices.
title: US Said to be Mulling DeepSeek Ban from Government Devices

description: Vivo Y300i 5G has been launched in China as Vivo's latest 5G smartphone. It runs on a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chip and is available in three colourways. The phone sports a 6.68-inch display with up to 120Hz refresh rate, a 50-megapixel rear camera, and is backed by a 6,500mAh battery with 44W fast charging support. The Vivo Y300i 5G will go on sale in China later this week.
title: Vivo Y300i 5G With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, 6,500mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications
